explanation: [0-0] In a street square, a boy in a black T-shirt and shorts is standing with his right hand raised to his forehead, facing right. A girl in a blue and white T-shirt and shorts is standing facing left. A man in a black T-shirt and jeans, holding a microphone, is standing next to them. Behind them are many spectators, with tall buildings in the background.
